name: Allpack.co
description:
Allpack.co is a driving arcade video game where you will be Packo, the new worker in Allpack Company, a first mile delivery company of Llama City.

Every morning you will receive the map with the deliveries of that day, and you will have to bring the packages to their destination. You must distribute all packages on time, indicated by a countdown that starts at the beginning of the day. Each level will represent a different day, so each day will have a lot of packages to deliver.

This game has as main references Crazy Taxi and Simpsons: Road Rage.

Our Team

Allpack.Co is a university project made by Dust Games, whose members are:
